# Example of how to use cronjob to run do your housekeeping often
# "neekware.com" should be replaced with your site domain name
###########################################################################

# run google sitemap every week
# 01 03 * * 0 /bin/bash /srv/www/neekware.com/pri/venv/webroot/bin/google.sh

# clear sessions every week (if using dbsession backend)
# 01 03 * * 0 /bin/bash /srv/www/neekware.com/pri/venv/webroot/bin/sessions.sh
